title: pushpa pura nivasa
sahitya:
puSpapura nivAsa bhISaNa raNadhIra bhuja bala dasha kaNTha gAva vilOla

anupallavi

 iSTa vara deivamA ingita sankEtamA duSTula dhvamsamu cEyu duritamugA rArA

caraNam

 bhuvanamella tirigi cUci kamalavana sthaLamulO dhyAninci tapamu cEsina dhanyulendarO ani
evariki telisenO adi vini shrI tyAgarAja telupavE srvOttama kaTAkSamutO
